Scramble an Image Start! Password # Rows # Cols Random Scramble Descramble Show Password Copy to Clipboard Camera Not Available Width Height Input Width and Height to Descramble Number of Rows and Columns: Options:
Set everything automatically, just pick the password

imgScramble Loading Quality of Image: Rearranging image Getting permutation from password Splitting image Finished splitting image Image saved Saving ... Image not done WidthHeight Send To Image Saved as Text in /Documents/imgScramble You will need to input your password, row and column number. If you want to send through apps that compress images, also input\n as width and as height. Copied parameters (except password) in terms of: Width Height Copied parameters (except password) in terms of: Quality Width Height Copied parameters (except password) in terms of: #rows #cols Width Height
